## OnRequestOpenChangeOptionsBase type

The base options for a request to change the open state of the dropdown menu. Excludes the `open` property. See [OnRequestOpenChangeOptions](./dropdown-menu.onrequestopenchangeoptions.md) for the full options object.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type OnRequestOpenChangeOptionsBase = {
    reason: OnRequestOpenChangeReason;
    event?: OnRequestOpenChangeEvent;
};
```
**References:** [OnRequestOpenChangeReason](./dropdown-menu.onrequestopenchangereason.md)<!-- -->, [OnRequestOpenChangeEvent](./dropdown-menu.onrequestopenchangeevent.md)
